DOC.detailed_description: A total 72 subject randomize study . Subjects stratify , base time start TB treatment , 'on-TB-treatment ' stratum ( TB treatment start 1 4 month prior Study Day 0 ) 'post-TB-treatment ' stratum ( TB treatment start least 12 month Study Day 0 ) . In on-TB-treatment stratum , 36 subject randomize receive AERAS-402 placebo follow : 1 2 dos placebo ( N=5 ) ; 1 dose AERAS-402 3 x 10^8 vp ( N=5 ) 3 x 10^9 vp ( N=10 ) , 2 dos AERAS-402 3 x 10^10 vp ( N=16 ) . In post-TB-treatment stratum , 36 subject randomize receive AERAS-402 placebo follow : 1 2 dos placebo ( N=6 ) ; 1 dose AERAS-402 3 x 10^8 vp ( N=5 ) 3 x 109 vp ( N=10 ) , 2 dos AERAS-402 3 x 10^10 vp ( N=15 ) .
